entityName: Life Partners IRA Holder Partnership, LLC

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

ConcentrationRiskPercentage1.label: Concentration Risk, Percentage
ConcentrationRiskPercentage1.description: "For an entity that discloses a concentration risk in relation to quantitative amount, which serves as the ""benchmark"" (or denominator) in the equation, this concept represents the concentration percentage derived from the division."

LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedAmount.label: Life Insurance, Corporate or Bank Owned, Amount
LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedAmount.description: This item represents the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the Entity as of the date of the statement of financial position. Such Entity-owned life insurance policies are commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, after Year Five
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, Year Five
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, Year Four
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, Year Three
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, Year Two
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMaturing.description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodCa.label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodCa.description: Fair value amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Face Value
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value (death benefits) of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, after Year Five
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Five
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Four
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Three
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Two
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodFa.description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, after Year Five
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Five
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Four
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Three
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Two
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodNu.description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodF.label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value
LifeSettlementContractsInvestmentMethodF.description: Face value (death benefits) of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
